task: Attached is a human bone Visium dataset and its corresponding cell2location deconvolution results. First, identify exactly 2 spatial niches using clustering on the main dataset. Determine which cell types are enriched in the osteogenic niche. Return a JSON object with one field: osteogenic_enriched_celltypes (list of cell type names that have higher mean abundance in the osteogenic niche compared to the other niche).

config.description: Tests for perfect Jaccard overlap (intersection over union) with the ground truth set of enriched cell types: Mesenchymal lineage. Passes if and only if predicted = {'Mesenchymal lineage'} (no false positives/negatives).

scoring.description: Passes only if the set of enriched cell types exactly matches the ground truth (Jaccard index = 1.0).
